text: Ana higeno Abija'ene sondia vahe'amo'za Jeroboamune sondia vahe'a zamahe'za zamarotgo hazage'za nefrage'za mago'a ranra kuma'zmia zamahe'za hanare'ne. E'i ana kumatmina, Beteli rankumaki, Jesana rankumaki, Efroni rankumaki, maka neone kumatmima ana rankumataminte'ma megagi'nea kumatmina zamahe'za hanare'naze.
